title: Sunrise Yoga Among the Olive Trees
shortDescription: Start your day with a gentle yoga session in nature
description: Reconnect with your body and mind with a morning yoga class held among centuries-old olive trees. Suitable for all levels, this experience combines gentle stretching, breathing exercises, and mindfulness in a unique outdoor setting. Mats are provided.

host.name: Sophie B.
host.description: Certified yoga instructor with a passion for connecting people to nature through movement and breath.
